title: As you like
author: VD
content_html: I’ve gotten a few emails requesting addition to the blogroll over the last six weeks or so. Since I’m not all that inclined to spend time digging through my inbox, if you have a blog and would like to be added to the list, please provide your blogname and the URL here.
content_text: I’ve gotten a few emails requesting addition to the blogroll over the last six weeks or so.  Since I’m not all that inclined to spend time digging through my inbox, if you have a blog and would like to be added to the list, please provide your blogname and the URL here.
